segments.text: Excuse me . Have you got any books on genetic engineering ? I've looked for them everywhere , but I can't find any .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure if we've got any now . Books of that kind are on this shelf . Well , I'm afraid we've sold out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity ! I should have come earlier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come some time next week if you like . I think we'll have got some by then .
segments.speaker: S2
